template.name: Template OS Linux over ssh
template.description:
Template for Linux (RedHat/CentOS) hosts, checks and triggers for monitoring using ssh sessions
Eugene Bobkov 10/2018

item.name: Active processes
item.description: Amount of active processes at the moment

item.name: Host availability
item.description: Check if host and its ssh service is available

item.name: Amount of CPUs
item.description: Amount of CPU on the host

item.name: System load(1m)
item.description: CPU and IO utilization of the last one minute

item.name: System load(5m)
item.description: CPU and IO utilization of the last five minutes

item.name: System load(10m)
item.description: CPU and IO utilization of the last ten minutes

item.name: MD5 checksum of /etc/passwd
item.description: MD5 checksum for /etc/passwd to check modifications

item.name: Amount of memory
item.description: Amount of memory on the host

item.name: Free memory (%)
item.description: Amount of free memory on the host

item.name: CPU idle time (%idle)
item.description: Show the percentage of idle CPU utilization

item.name: CPU iowait time (%iowait)
item.description: Show the percentage of time that the CPU or CPUs were idle during which the system had an outstanding disk I/O request.

item.name: CPU user time (%usr)
item.description: Show the percentage of CPU utilization that occurred while executing at the user level (application)

item.name: Total processes
item.description: Total amount of processes at the moment

item.name: Uptime since
item.description: System up since, in yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS format

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.params: df -Pk | awk 'BEGIN{line = "true"; print "{ \"data\":["} \ /^\// {if (line){line = ""} else {printf ","}; print "{\"{#FSNAME}\":\"" $6 "\"}"} \ END {print "]\n}"}'

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template OS Linux over ssh:ssh.run[used%_{#FSNAME},{HOST.HOST},{$PORT}].last()}>{$FS_WARNING} and {Template OS Linux over ssh:ssh.run[used%_{#FSNAME},{HOST.HOST},{$PORT}].last()}<={$FS_AVERAGE}
trigger_prototype.name: Space usage exceeded {$FS_WARNING} % (ITEM.VALUE1) on {#FSNAME}
